The space
The accommodation consists of a very large and spacious double bedroom with a private bathroom and kitchenette for your sole use on the second floor of our newly restored brownstone in the historic West Side district of Jersey City.

name: Stylish Apt 40 mins from NYC - TV/Laundry/Parking
description:
Monthly renters welcome.

Rent this tastefully decorated, sun drenched one bedroom urban apartment 40 minutes away from Manhattan. One parking spot on site. Located near light rail train in the bustling Bergen-Lafayette section of Jersey City, this unit features a plush queen bed, an extra air mattress, 49" LED TV, Netflix and WiFi, fully equipped kitchen, walk-in shower, and in-unit laundry. Street parking usually available. You will be steps away from parks and trendy restaurants.

The space
This apartment has been updated to feature a mix of modern design and old-world brick townhouse charm. Everything you need is provided - fresh towels, tissue paper, soaps/shampoo/bodywash, cooking utensils and new appliances. Ground coffee and coffee maker in the kitchen will power your mornings and prepare you for a full day of NYC sightseeing.

Treat yourself to apartment living at its finest in Jersey City's waterfront. Let the spectacular Manhattan views brighten up your nights and enjoy the luxurious kitchens and bathrooms. Close to all transport connections and free from New York’s hustle and bustle, give in to all the stunning onsite amenities like a resort-style pool, a modern fitness-center and guests' club room.

The space

Run with the family pet at the in-house dog run. Maybe grill at the barbeque. Try a yoga class. name: Garden Studio Minutes to Lower Manhattan
description:
Studio apartment in historic rear building close to 2 ferries and Path train to Manhattan (7 minute walk to the Path, 4 minutes to each of the ferries). Located in a quiet rear building in the historic Paulus Hook neighborhood, this apartment is on the 1st floor (the owners live on the top two floors). The apartment has a full kitchen and wifi, and is entered through a lovely courtyard garden that guests can enjoy in good weather, which has chairs and a picnic table.

The space
The apartment is located in a unique rear building in the middle of a block. It is accessed through the front building, you pass through a hallway and then a garden courtyard to enter the building. The courtyard has a picnic table and chairs to relax when the weather is nice (in the warmer seasons).

Guest access
The apartment has wifi and a bluetooth speaker but no television. Guests can also relax in the courtyard that is right outside the apartment door. In the warm

name: Sunny and Spacious Luxury Building
description:
Flexible Check-In! Check out is 11am, flexible check out available for extra $15/hour till 9pm (based on availability). 10-15 minutes to Manhattan! Luxury building. No gym but we have a rock climbing wall not to far away.
5 minute walk to breath-taking city views and ferry to NYC!
Train station is close by and will take you to 34th Street (Penn station) or the World Trade Center.
Many shops and restaurant within walking distance.

The space
One bedroom apartment (800 square feet), chic decorations, with spacious room, sink bathroom, queen size bed.
Please be accurate with the number of people staying over.
We have a full size fridge, dishwasher, oven and stove. I have dish-ware, pots and pans you are welcome to use. Guests do not have washer/dryer access.

Guest access
Entire apartment is available.

name: Huge 25 foot LOFT just $55 only 3 blocks from PATH
description:
A huge spacious loft 20 x 25 ft. King-sized bed, dorm-sized fridge, WIFI, air-conditioner. Flooded with light from 2 Skylights and three windows. Furnishings are an eclectic mix of period pieces. Work Area; Dining Area: oak dining table and chairs. Cozy Sitting Area: futon sofa. Dressers, Clothes cabinet, bookcases. Kitchen and bathroom are shared. The bathroom is located on the second floor and the loft is located at top floor large Row House. We are in a National Historic district.

The space
The LOFT is a very spacious, quiet, light-filled space within a very large row house located downtown on a lovely tree-lined street

Guest access
Parking is extremely difficult and only available with a permit for locals. However, there are lots of public transportation options: PATH train, light-rail train, local low cost van service.

Other things to note
House cat on premises

name: Luxury JC Condo, 3 blks PATH, 2 stps Manhattan WTC
description:
Downtown completely renovated 2nd story Historic Brick Condo 3 blocks from PATH subway access (2 stops World Trade and West Village), guaranteed parking 1 block away, 15 min drive to NYC. Perfect for business travelers or visiting couples w/ convenient NYC access, high speed internet access and 32" monitor, printer. You'll love the Jules Verne themed dining area and lavish amenities.

We purchased and renovated the place, gutting the plaster interior and exposing the original 1852 brick to build our fantasy condo. Soaring 50 stories above the Hudson River, this glamorous tower has everything a traveler would need (and more!) for a trip to the NYC metro. Enjoy all the bells and whistles, including:
- Upscale furnishings, tall ceilings, and gourmet kitchens in every unit
- Resort-style building amenities such as an outdoor pool, theater room, gym, and 24/7 concierge
- Light rail steps from the front door and easy access to PATH
- Walkable neighborhood a block from Newport Centre

The space
Why stay in Manhattan when you can savor the peace and quiet of this luxurious Jersey City high-rise? Away from the hustle and bustle of Times Square and Fifth Avenue, this Downtown Jersey City building is a better value than anything you’d find across the Hudson - and you can still get to NYC in minutes via the ferry or the PATH train.

name: ❤️ Large&Sunny Apartment Close To NYC ❤️
description:
Charming 3BR/1 BA - sleeps 2-6

Come stay in this stylish apartment, 25+ minutes away from Manhattan. A walk away from the beautiful Lincoln Park and close to Little India where you'll have the tastiest Indian food everrrrr.

Close access to NYC by the Path train, especially World Trade Center, Statue of Liberty, the West Village and Tribeca, the hippest coolest neighborhoods in NYC. 15 minutes drive from the Newark airport.

The space
❤️“Very stylish home! Very clean and comfortable space! Accommodations were much better than anticipated”

The apartment is large and sunny, featuring a huge master bedroom with a large closet and lots of natural light coming from the bay windows. There is another private bedroom, and a bedroom that you walk through to get to the master one. The space feels spacious and private. Large galley style kitchen with stainless appliances and lots of natural light, great for family or friends get togethers.

There's an ice cream shop (Torico) across the street. It's a five-minute walk to the Grove Street PATH station, where you can get the train to New York City or Hoboken. Door-to-door time to downtown NYC is about 20 minutes.

Jersey City Short-Term Rental Permit #STR21-00072

The space
The house was built in 1887 and is one of five identical houses at this end of the block. It was converted into a 3-family at some point, probably 1970s or 1980s. This apartment is the second floor. The third floor is a separate Airbnb apartment, look for "Apt 3 in downtown Jersey City home near NYC."

description:
Welcome to our garden apartment in Jersey City. Located in a safe, quiet residential street, it is a perfect place to relax after a day in the city. The space

description:
Beautifully renovated & modern ground floor apartment in a historic townhouse located in the most famed Van Vorst Park district of Jersey city. Fully stocked kitchen, hotel style amenities and a private outdoor patio!

Minutes walk to the best restaurants, cafes & bars that Jersey City has to offer. Get to Manhattan in under 15 mins (a short walk to Grove St PATH station & two stops to NYC).

If you are planning to have a car, street parking is available and is free all weekend and weekday nights from 9pm to 7am, and 2 hr parking is free during the day (7am to 9pm). We have always found a spot within a couple of blocks.

Alternatively, there is a garage nearby, Edison ParkFast, that is around $20/day. It’s about a 6 min walk to our place.

name: Luxe Private 1 Bdrm & Bath minutes to NYC
description:
Conveniently located in downtown Jersey City, near restaurants, bars and shops. Just a 3 min walk to Grove St station and 2 stops to downtown Manhattan WTC and 20 mins (7.1 miles) from Newark international airport. This penthouse unit is on a quiet street tucked away from the hustle and bustle, yet only a block away from the vibrant Newark Pedestrian Walkway filled with restaurants, bars, rooftops, and shops in the historic downtown district.

The space
This is the master bedroom and bath in a two bedrooms condo with a fully equipped kitchen, dining room and living room. In the private bedroom, you have a small office space that faces west so you will get lots of afternoon sunlight. The entire apartment is available for rent as well. Please inquire if interested.

Guest access
Guest will have access to the entire apartment, laundry, patio and outdoor courtyard.

Other things to note
I have a black cat. His name is Yogi.

name: Sunny bedroom w/ WFH set up.
description:
Dear travelers and Airbnbers,

This is a New listing for 1 bedroom in apartment. New York City is just 15 mins drive away. Public transportation is also convinient by walking distance.

The space
This a private Sunny room listing that has a Thick/ soft queen size bed with an Work-from-home set up the desk and chair. Ideal for 1-2 visitors. Big huge Large living room and open Kitchen will be sharing with other roommates. Weekly free cleaning is included. We also offer our tea bag, coffee machine and simple breakfast for local stores.

Guest access
- Smart TV
- Air conditioner/heater
- Hangers for cloths
- Washer
- Dryer
- Fresh towels
- Shampoo/bath soap
- Fresh clean bed sheets
- Hardwood floor
- Large bathroom
- Bathtub/shower
- 1000M speed internet/wifi
